location.physicalLocation: Special Collections Division of the Nashville Public Library, 615 Church Street, Nashville, Tennessee, 37219

mods.abstract: A photograph of Evans Hill Missionary Baptist Church located at 1341 Tulip Grove Road in Hermitage, Tennessee. The historic structure was completed in 1952. The building foundation is comprised of concrete blocks that have been painted red. The exterior walls are red brick. The roof is gabled and made with tar shingles. The windows are tall and narrow. Some windows incorporate colored glass. The doors are made of wood with glass windows. An addition to the building was constructed in 1981. It is a one story addition located to the rear right of the original structure. The roof on this added structure is also a gabled with tar shingles. The windows are colored glass and the walls are made of red brick. Forms part of the Historic Nashville, Inc. Sacred Sites Survey Project. 1 photograph : col. ; 4 x 6 in.

titleInfo.title: Historic Nashville, Inc. Sacred Sites Survey Project
